doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia

Marble mantel from John Jacob Astor house, Cherry St, NYC 1954--Stair Scroll Bracket like Plain Dealing, Brookhill & Carrsbrook--William Branch Home 1845--Roger Macbride Home, Libertarian Candidate for President of US; wife descendant of painter Rembrandt Peale 1967

2 Story Brick, 48'x45,' Doric Entablature, Had Side Portico, 3 Bay, 2 Pile, Center Passage Not Through, Flemish Bond, Queens Closers, 3 Course American Bond, Hipped Roof, Widows Walk, Plaster Medallion, Stone Lintels, Plaster Belt Course, Marbleized Mantel, Rectangular Banisters, Cellar Beam with Wedges, Hemp Roof Caulking, Earth Floor Insulation, Symmetrical Trim, Rondel Blocks, 2 Leaf Door, Regency Door, Chinese Window Railings, Blinds, Tripartite Windows, Triple Hung Sash, 9/9, 8/8, 6/9, 2/2, 6/6, 6/6/6, 8/8/8, Pyramidal Outbuildings
William B Phillips circa 1819--Floyd Johnson, Architect circa 1953
